subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] So cool, got em! Edgar Cayce came through,
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
The same voice converted to mp3 using sound recorder. It's windows program.
go to programs--accessories--entertainment--sound recorder. Open the file,
the go to properties--convert now, then pick mpeg-3, and "save as". takes
about 3.26 seconds for the whole process.  This one is 28k your original
over a meg, smaller to save, faster to send.

 F-S

On Fri, May 7, 2010 at 12:32 PM, <SnowfireL@...> wrote:

>
>
>  Ok, got em!  Here he is all for you guys, (someone here asked for "Edgar
> Cayce")  Well, here he is, <G>  This file says; "Bonnie, I'm Egar Cayce"  it
> is obvious that he is in Heaven beyond the white light, so that is the
> reason for so much static.  This is truly beginners luck, i am grateful to
> Mr Cayce to speak to us.  I'm sure there is more on here, but I would
> say this is good enough for now.sf
>
>
